participant_1.background:
I love Halloween because I don't have to wake up early.
i like to cook with food i grow in my garden.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
I love to crochet, but I could not be a crochet instructor if I were blind.
I am a music student who is ready to start my day, but my car is acting up

participant_2.background:

not a day goes by that i don t drink four mountain dews.
I wake up early, feed my cats, and read my favorite comic books before I start blogging.
i work in a flower shop.
i grew up in the deep south.

content.text: Hey, my car is acting up. I am a music student and I need to get to my lesson. Do you have a car?
I do. I wake up early, feed my cats, and read my favorite comic books before I start blogging.
That sounds like a nice morning routine. Do you mind giving me a ride?
I don't mind at all. I just have to get my cats ready.
Thank you! I really appreciate it.
Sure thing. I love helping people out.
I am excited to get to my lesson. I am working on a new piece of music.
That sounds really exciting. I love music. I used to play the guitar, but I don't have time anymore.
That is too bad. I love playing music. It is so relaxing.
Maybe you can pick it up again one day.
I hope so. It was a lot of fun.
So, what are your favorite comic books?
I love Marvel Comics. I am really excited for the new Doctor Strange movie.
Me too! I am a big fan of Benedict Cumberbatch.
He is great in the role.
I am really excited to see the movie.
